name: JavaScript SDK
short_description: Browser independent JavaScript SDK. ClassLoader to lazy load JavaScript classes, extensions to core JavaScript, Reflection API, Collection API, Unit Testing API, AJAX API, Logging API, and Custom/DOM Event API. What JavaScript should be and can be.
